name: A journey in a child's dreams (THUNDER8)
name_original: A journey in a child's dreams (THUNDER8)
description:
Try to explore what happened by diving into the depths of the dream filled with questions about the fate of the child on his journey

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or later
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or equivalent with 4 hardware threads
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB, AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB, or equivalent DX11 compatible GPU with 2GB of memory
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
